description:
The group set attribute should report the list of security groups to which an instance belongs; an example from EC2:

                    [groupSet] => CFSimpleXML Object
                        (
                            [item] => CFSimpleXML Object
                                (
                                    [groupId] => test
                                )

                        )
title: EC2 API does not report instance security groups

comments.content:
The group set attribute should report the list of security groups to which an instance belongs; an example from EC2:

                    [groupSet] => CFSimpleXML Object
                        (
                            [item] => CFSimpleXML Object
                                (
                                    [groupId] => test
                                )

                        )
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlane
